ygData.subject: Re: Leveling when new
ygData.msgSnippet: Getting into well-balanced groups will level you more quickly than solo hunting. If you get a power leveling friend, all the better. If someone can give you
ygData.messageBody:
Getting into well-balanced groups will level you more quickly than
solo hunting. If you get a power leveling friend, all the better. If
someone can give you stuff, buffs and keep you healed while you fight
yellows and reds, you go up fast.

I prefer taking my time moving up, more in the way of roll-playing.
Seeking new experieces, planning trips and adventures.

Barto Proudfoot

--- In EverQuest@y..., Rob LeBeau <rlebeau65@y...> wrote:
> Trying to keep discussions alive........
> What is a good way to level up fast. Meaning, I see
> people say things like I can get from level 3-6 in
> around an hour.
>
> Well, the other day, I was on 5 hours and just leveled
> once.
>
> As a Newbie should we venture to more hostile grounds
> with others to level? Should we go to the same types
> of places as a group but not form a group so I can
> level faster? Or just stay in the newbie area until
> we get there?
>
> Enough for now
>
> Later all helpfuls.....
>
